Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-lad
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: keruk’i sifira bayechachewi gīzē le’iriswa yek’uch’iti megenifelinina manafatini yisemalu፡፡
iji kefiniji yetašeru ẖonewimi ke’iriswa bet’ebabi sifira betet’alu gīzē bezīya sifira t’ifatini yit’eralu፤ (wa t’ifatachini yilalu)፡፡
፡-zarē ānidini t’ifati bicha ātit’iru bizunimi t’ifati t’iru (yibalalu)፡፡
(inidīhi) belachewi «yihi yeteshale newini weyisi t’inik’uk’ochu tesifa yeteset’wati yezele‘alemwa geneti» le’inerisu minidana memelesha ẖonechi፡፡
le’inesu bewisit’wa zewitarīwochi ẖonewi yemīfeliguti hulu ālilachewi፡፡ (yihimi) tesifa kegētahi telemanyi tesifa newi፡፡
inerisunina ke’ālahi lēla yemīgigezwachewinimi yemīsebesibibachewinina «inanite inezīhini barochēni āsasatachihuni weyisi inesuwi menigedini satu» yemīlibetini k’eni (āsitawisi)፡፡

«t’irati yigebahi፤ kanite lēla redatochini liniyizi le’inya tegebīyachini ālineberemi፡፡ gini inerisunimi ābatochachewinimi megenizebini isiketewu diresi āt’ak’emikachewi፡፡ t’efī ḥizibochimi ẖonu» yilalu፡፡
bemitilutimi (āmalikitochachihu) āsiwashuwachihu፡፡ k’it’atēni megefiterinimi meridatinimi ātichilumi፡፡ ke’inanitemi yemībedilewini talak’ini k’it’ati inak’emisewaleni፤ (yibalalu)፡፡

ke’ānite befītimi kemelikitenyochi inesu be’irigit’i migibini yemībelu begebeyawochimi yemīẖēdu ẖonewi besitek’eri ālilakinimi፡፡ kefīlachihunimi lekefīlu fetena ādirigenali፡፡ titagesalachihuni gētahimi temelikachi newi፡፡
